short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you add new cards to boards/lists and attach the current page as a comment

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add cards to Trello from any page. The extension is fairly simple, the screenshots should explain it all.


Github link: https://github.com/wyegelwel/Trello_It
